name: Classic Tetris
description:
Welcome,

Here is a simple and very classic tetris.

I made it to increase my C# and monogame programming skills and code it as a game jam.

It's a part of GameCodeur course. https://www.gamecodeur.fr/

Code langage : C# + Monogame framework (any external library)

Graphisms : myself

sounds : music from GameCodeur pack

The keyboard controls are very simples :

Left and right arrow to to take directions

up arrow to rotate

down arrow to speed up falling

On each screen, you can use escape key to quit to previous. In main menu, using escape key will quit the game.

Thank's to give a try to this simple game.

Enjoy ;)
